page.title: 07MIXED FARMING STIRLING.
page.content: {Hillhead Farm},Cambusbarron,Stirling is all crops.The{crops}are barley, turnips ,potatoes and grass.The farm covers 170 acres.The kinds of barley are Geordie,Golden Promise and Triumph.The kinds of potatoes are Maurice Piper and Golden Wonders.The turnips are Scotch. On the farm there are{cattle, sheep and some horses}.The horses are owned by people from the village. There is no specific cattle breed because the cattle are cross bred for beef. They have a lot of sheep and in Spring they have lambs. The sheds are mainly used for storing things in although one shed is used for cattle. They do not live in the original{house because it is a ruin and they have built another house and that is the one they live in now. (G.JOHNSTON, K.MACKIE,S.MACKAY,I.SANDERSON)
